name: ANTEDILUVIAN (Kamolchanok)
description:
You're the chosen one, who have to fight against the necromancers that bring back a monster army from the dead.Play this game on Unity WebGL.

In this game, you need to find " The 4 Sacred Tree" that each one is protected by a dragon. Use the tree  to destroy the necromancers' barrier then exterminate them all!


How to play

Movement - W A S D

Running - Shift

Jump - Space

Fire - Left Click
